cornerTheMarket.title: Corner the Market
cornerTheMarket.condition: Control 4 planets that each have the same planet trait.
developWeaponry.title: Develop Weaponry
diversityResearch.title: Diversify Research
diversityResearch.condition: Own 2 technologies in each of 2 colors.
erectAMonument.title: Erect a Monument
expandBorders.title: Expand Borders
foundResearchOutpost.title: Found Research Outposts
foundResearchOutpost.condition: Control 3 planets that have technology specialties.
intimidateCouncil.title: Intimidate Council
intimidateCouncil.condition: Have 1 or more ships in 2 systems that are adjacent to Mecatol Rex's System.
leadFromTheFront.title: Lead From the Front
leadFromTheFront.condition: Spend a total of 3 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools.
negotiateTradeRoutes.title: Negotiate Trade Routes
swayTheCouncil.title: Sway the Council
amassWealth.title: Amass wealth
amassWealth.condition: Spend 3 influence, 3 resources and 3 trade goods.
buildDefences.title: Build Defenses
buildDefences.condition: Have 4 or more structures (on the game board).
discoverLostOutpost.title: Discover Lost Outposts
engineerAMarvel.title: Engineer a Marvel
engineerAMarvel.condition: Have your flagship or a war sun on the game board.
exploreDeepSpace.title: Explore Deep Space
exploreDeepSpace.condition: Have units in 3 systems that do not contain planets.
improveInfrastructure.title: Improve Infrastructure
improveInfrastructure.condition: Have structures on 3 planets outside of your home system.
makeHistory.title: Make History
makeHistory.condition: Have units in 2 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex or anomalies.
populateTheOuterRim.title: Populate the Outer Rim
populateTheOuterRim.condition: Have units in 3 systems on the edge of the game board (other than your home system).
pushBoundaries.title: Push Boundaries
pushBoundaries.condition: Control more planets than each of 2 of your neighbors.
raiseAFleet.title: Raise a Fleet
raiseAFleet.condition: Have 5 or more non-fighter ships in one system.
centralizeGalacticTrade.title: Centralize Galactic Trade
conquerTheWeak.title: Conquer the Weak
conquerTheWeak.condition: Control 1 planet that is in another player's home system.
formGalacticBrainTrust.title: Form Galactic Brain Trust
formGalacticBrainTrust.condition: Control 5 planets that have technology specialties.
foundAGoldenAge.title: Found a Golden Age
galvanizeThePeople.title: Galvanize the People
galvanizeThePeople.condition: Spend a total of 6 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools.
manipulateGalacticLaw.title: Manipulate Galactic Law
masterTheSciences.title: Master the Sciences
masterTheSciences.condition: Own 2 technologies in each of 4 colors.
masterTheSciences.description: Technology colors: Green - Biotic, Red - Warfare, Blue - Propulsion, Yellow - Cybernetic
revolutionizeWarfare.title: Revolutionize Warfare
subdueTheGalaxy.title: Subdue the Galaxy
unifyTheColonies.title: Unify the Colonies
unifyTheColonies.condition: Control 6 planets that each have the same planet trait.
achieveSupremacy.title: Achieve Supremacy
achieveSupremacy.condition: Have your flagship or a war sun in another player's home system or the Mecatol Rex system.
becomeALegend.title: Become a Legend
becomeALegend.condition: Have units in 4 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies.
commandAnArmada.title: Command an Armada
commandAnArmada.condition: Have 8 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system.
constructMassiveCities.title: Construct Massive Cities
constructMassiveCities.condition: Have 7 or more structures (on the game board).
controlTheBorderlands.title: Control the Borderlands
controlTheBorderlands.condition: Have units in 5 systems on the edge of the game board (other than your home system).
holdVastReserves.title: Hold Vast Reserves
holdVastReserves.condition: Spend 6 influence, 6 resources and 6 trade goods.
patrolVastTerritories.title: Patrol Vast Territories
patrolVastTerritories.condition: Have units in 5 systems that do not contain planets.
protectTheBorder.title: Protect the Border
protectTheBorder.condition: Have structures on 5 planets outside of your home system.
reclaimAncientMonuments.title: Reclaim Ancient Monuments
ruleDistantLands.title: Rule Distant Lands
ruleDistantLands.condition: Control 2 planets that are each in or adjacent to a different, other player's home system.
destroyTheirGreatestShip.title: Destroy Their Greatest Ship
destroyTheirGreatestShip.condition: Destroy another player's war sun or flagship.
makeAnExampleOfTheirWorld.title: Make an Example of Their World
makeAnExampleOfTheirWorld.condition: Use BOMBARDMENT to destroy the last of a player's ground forces on a planet.
sparkARebellion.title: Spark a Rebellion
sparkARebellion.condition: Win a combat against a player who has the most victory points.
turnTheirFleetsToDust.title: Turn Their Fleets to Dust
turnTheirFleetsToDust.condition: Use SPACE CANNON to destroy the last of a player's ships in a system.
unveilFlagship.title: Unveil Flagship
unveilFlagship.condition: Win a space combat in a system that contains your flagship. You cannot score this objective if your flagship is destroyed in the combat.
becomeAMartyr.title: Become a Martyr
becomeAMartyr.condition: Lose control of a planet in a home system.
betrayAFriend.title: Betray a Friend
betrayAFriend.condition: Win a combat against a player whose promissory note you had in your play area at the start of your tactical action.
braveTheVoid.title: Brave the Void
braveTheVoid.condition: Win a combat in an anomaly.
darkenTheSkies.title: Darken the Skies
darkenTheSkies.condition: Win a combat in another player's home system.
demonstrateYourPower.title: Demonstrate Your Power
demonstrateYourPower.condition: Have 3 or more non-fighter ships in the active system at the end of a space combat.
fightWithPrecision.title: Fight With Precision
fightWithPrecision.condition: Use ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE to destroy the last of a player's fighters in a system.
proveEndurance.title: Prove Endurance
proveEndurance.condition: Be the last player to pass during a game round.
adaptNewStrategies.title: Adapt New Strategies
adaptNewStrategies.condition: Own 2 faction technologies. (Valefar Assimilator technologies do not count toward this objective)
becomeTheGatekeeper.title: Become the Gatekeeper
becomeTheGatekeeper.condition: Have 1 or more ships in a system that contains an alpha wormhole and 1 or more ships in a system that contains a beta wormhole.
controlTheRegion.title: Control the Region
controlTheRegion.condition: Have 1 or more ships in 6 systems.
cutSupplyLines.title: Cut Supply Lines
cutSupplyLines.condition: Have 1 or more ships in the same system as another player's space dock.
establishAPerimeter.title: Establish a Perimeter
establishAPerimeter.condition: Have 4 PDS units on the game board.
forgeAnAlliance.title: Forge an Alliance
formASpyNetwork.title: Form a Spy Network
fuelTheWarMachine.title: Fuel the War Machine
fuelTheWarMachine.condition: Have 3 space docks on the game board.
gatherAMightyFleet.title: Gather a Mighty Fleet
gatherAMightyFleet.condition: Have 5 dreadnoughts on the game board.
learnTheSecretsOfTheCosmos.title: Learn the Secrets of the Cosmos
learnTheSecretsOfTheCosmos.condition: Have 1 or more ships in 3 systems that are each adjacent to an anomaly.
masterTheLawsOfPhysics.title: Master the Laws of Physics
masterTheLawsOfPhysics.condition: Own 4 technologies of the same color.
mineRareMetals.title: Mine Rare Metals
monopolizeProduction.title: Monopolize Production
occupyTheSeatOfTheEmpire.title: Occupy the Seat of the Empire
occupyTheSeatOfTheEmpire.condition: Control Mecatol Rex and have 3 or more ships in its system.
threatenEnemies.title: Threaten Enemies
threatenEnemies.condition: Have 1 or more ships in a system that is adjacent to another player's home system.
defySpaceAndTime.title: Defy Space and Time
defySpaceAndTime.condition: Have units in the wormhole nexus
destroyHereticalWorks.title: Destroy Heretical Works
destroyHereticalWorks.condition: Purge 2 of your relic fragments of any type.
destroyHereticalWorks.description: If an ability instructs a player to purge a component, that component is removed from the game and returned to the box
establishHegemony.title: Establish Hegemony
establishHegemony.condition: Control planets that have a combined influence value of at least 12.
fosterCohesion.title: Foster Cohesion
fosterCohesion.condition: Be neighbors with all other players
hoardRawMaterials.title: Hoard Raw Materials
hoardRawMaterials.condition: Control planets that have a combined resource value of at least 12.
mechanizeTheMilitary.title: Mechanize The Military
mechanizeTheMilitary.condition: Have 1 mech on each of 4 planets.
occupyTheFringe.title: Occupy The Fringe
occupyTheFringe.condition: Have 9 or more ground forces on a planet that does not contain 1 of your space docks.
produceEnMasse.title: Produce En Masse
produceEnMasse.condition: Have units with a combined PRODUCTION value of at least 8 in a single system.
seizeAnIcon.title: Seize An Icon
stakeYourClaim.title: Stake your Claim
stakeYourClaim.condition: Control a planet in a system that contains a planet controlled by another player.
strengthenBonds.title: Strengthen Bonds
strengthenBonds.condition: Have another player's promissory note in your play area.
dictatePolicy.title: Dictate Policy
dictatePolicy.condition: There are 3 or more laws in play
driveTheDebate.title: Drive the Debate
driveTheDebate.condition: You or a planet you control are elected by an agenda.
